title: ATLAS - CHECK  CALCUL DES PMA SUR METAUX PRECIEUX
time_sequence: GN - ATLAS PHASE 5.3 - PROCESSING AFTER STAR 1

task_list.instruction_title:
Check reception PMA from ODS

**Requête SQL : **

select pma.* from nhdbo.t_ac_pma_pr pma, nhdbo.t_fu_client fcl
where pma.nbr_co_1046 = fcl.nbr_co_1057
and pma.nbr_cli12_1046 = fcl.nbr_client_1057
